summary: MY CAR IS 2001 ACURA CL TYPE S 35000 MILES. BEEN DRIVING FOR LESS THAN A YEAR. MY TRANSMISSION WAS FAILED PAST SATURDAY. WAS TRAVEL AT 50 MPH SUDDENLY TRANSMISSION FAILED AND WON'T ACCELERATE. THE CAR BEHIND ME ALMOST HIT ME. I RECEIVED A RECALL STATEMENT FROM ACURA BACK ON DEC. 2002 ABOUT THE TRANSMISSION. I TOOK MY CAR TO LOCAL DEALER TO HAVE THE TRANSMISSION REPLACE BUT THEY REFUSED CAUSE MY CAR WARRANTY HAS BEEN CANCELLED SINCE FEB. 2002. BECAUSE OF THE RECALLED, SHOULD MY CAR COVER UNDER THIS WARRANTY EVEN MY CAR HAVE SAVAGE TITLE?
